parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
Thus, so, in this manner. Or (referring to what precedes or follows).

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A primary verb; to 'grave', especially to write; figuratively, to describe.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Anointed One; the Messiah, the Christ. From chrio; Anointed One, i.e. The Messiah, an epithet of Jesus.
I am acted upon in a certain way, either good or bad; I experience ill treatment, suffer.
To raise up, set up; I rise from among (the) dead; I arise, appear. From ana and histemi; to stand up.
From out, out from among, from, suggesting from the interior outwards. A primary preposition denoting origin, from, out.
(a) adj: dead, lifeless, subject to death, mortal, (b) noun: a dead body, a corpse. From an apparently primary nekus; dead.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Third. Ordinal from treis; third; neuter a third part, or a third time, thirdly.
A day, the period from sunrise to sunset.
